column8:
T Rex T-shirt.

Despite being the star of Jurassic Park, the Tyrannosaurus Rex was from the Cretaceous period. Maybe Cretaceous Park didn't quite have the same ring. Anyway, it was big, mighty and never fails to appeal to those of us with XY Chromosomes. This design is part of an ongoing dinosaur collection of t shirts, so look out for further Cretaceous t-shirt designs.

Wear our T Rex t-shirt in admiration of the beast.
